The objective of this chapter of the report is to present results of the survey of national recommendations for 
nutrition, physical activity and weight gain during pregnancy, undertaken by the WHO Regional Office for Europe 
during 2014. The purpose of the survey was to identify how many Member States have national policies on 
maternal, newborn and infant nutritional health, along
